5 wani loka kusalanaya pakisthanayata shri lankawen honda aarambhayak2011 loka krikat kirula thek 5ada apa kathakaranne 1992 wasare pawathi 5 wani loka kusalana tharagawaliyedi shri lanka kandayame iranama wisandunu aakarayayi.ostreliyawa saha nawasilanthaya sathkaraka ratawal lesa pawathwunu mema 5 wani tharagawaliye shurathawa bensan and hejas kusalanaya lesa handinwini.oostreliyawa loka shurayin lesath, engalanthaya, indiyawa (1983 loka shurayan), nawasilanthaya, pakisthanaya, dakunu api්rakawa, shri lankawa, batahira indiya kodewwan (1975 saha 1979 loka shurayin) saha simbabwe yana ratawal 9 melesa tharaga waduni.arawinda1972 pebarawari 2 wanida aarambhaka tharagaya nawasilanthaye ookland hi eedn pak pitiy nawasilanthaya saha oostreliyawa athara pawathi athara nawasilanthaya lakunu 37kin jayagrahanaya kaleya.mulika watayedi ek ratak prathiwadi sama ratak samangama tharaga wadimen pasu labunu lakunu anuwa awasan purwa wataya sandaha sudussan therunu athara, me anuwa ek ratakata tharaga 8k krida kala yuthu wuni.muliya watayedi tharaga 8kin 7k jayagrahanaya kara 1k parajaya wu nawasilanthaya lakunu 14k labamin idiriyenma siti athara engalanthaya jaya 5, paraja 2, jaya paradumen thora 1yi lesa lakunu 11k labaganimin dewani sthanayath, jayagrahana 5, paraja 3 samanga lakunu 10k labu dakunu aprikawa thunwani sthanayath jayagrahana 4, parajaya 3, jaya paraja 1 samanga prasada lakunu 9k labagath pakisthanaya siwwani sthanayatath pathwiya.oostreliyawa 5 wani sthanayath, kodewwan 6 wani sthanayath, loka shura indiyawa 7 wani sthanayath shri lankawa 8 wani sthanayath simbabwe awasan sthanayath lesa labamin sesu ratawal paha mulika watayen iwath wiya.awasan purwa wataye palamu tharagaya marthu 21 wanida nawasilanthaya ha pakisthanaya athara pawathwini.

madhyama kandukarayata eeye (9) perawaruwe sita dharanipatha wasi pathanaya wima nisa lakshapana, wimalasurendra, kaniyan jalasha piri ithiriyama nisa wan doratu wiwrutha karanu labiya.lakshapana wan doratu thunakda, wimalasurendra jalashaye wan doratu 6kda, kaniyan jalashaye wan doratu dekak da wiwrutha kerini.balagara aashritha pradeshawalata pramanawath paridi wasi nowatima nisa pasugiya kalaya thula mema jalashawala jala mattam shighra lesa pahatha wati thibina.
